English: A car crash happened on the street.
I got into a car crash.
A car drove on a pedestrian.
There's a lot of blood coming from the wound.
I think my leg is broken.
A man got a heart attack.
An unconscious man is laying on the street.
Hungarian: Az utcán egy öntudatlan férfi fekszik.

English: Some woman just collapsed to the ground
Hungarian: Egy nő éppen összeesett a földre.

English: I don't know if they are breathing.
There's a fire in my apartment.
My apartment has been broken into.
There's a stranger in my apartment.
There's a lot of smoke in the staircase.
There's shouting coming from my neighbors.
I heard a shot from my neighbors.
I saw a man with a weapon.
Two men are harassing a woman.
My child ate some of my meds.
My child had an allergic reaction.
Somebody is drowning in the lake.
My friend fell through the ice.
Could you call an ambulance for me?
Could you bring me to the hospital?
Did you see the car's registration plate?
Did everyone make it out of the house?
What's taking the ambulance so long?
How fast will the ambulance arrive?
Did you hit your head when you fell?
Can you stay and wait for the police?
Hungarian: Tudsz maradni és várni a rendőrséget?
